hero.body: At KICKS CREW, we believe that the CREW is what defines us. Being the hottest CREW in town, MIRROR embodies the CREW when all members dazzle together. The KICKS CREW x MIRROR Collaboration is available globally; offering a variety of MIRROR CREW memorabilia for all the fans. Come and JOIN THE CREW and electrify the MIRROR CREW.

memorabilia.header: KICKS CREW x MIRROR | LIMITED EDITION MIRROR CREW MEMORABILIA
memorabilia.body: From April 24 2023 to May 21 2023, for any customers who spends more than HKD399 (single purchase) on KICKS CREW and inserts a specific CREW CODE will have a chance to redeem the limited edition MIRROR CREW TRADING CARD & MIRROR CREW TAGS (LIMITED NUMBERED EDITION OF 500 for each MIRROR CREW member). Stay tuned with us and collect your favorite MIRROR CREW member memorabilia!

schedule.prompt: FIND YOUR CREW (LIMITED TO 500 EACH CODE)

behindTheScenes.header: BEHIND THE SCENES WITH KICKS CREW x MIRROR

TermsAndConditions.subtitle: (Details)
TermsAndConditions.description:
• The giveaway period will commence on 24th April 2023 in Hong Kong only.
  • All images & photos are for reference only.
 • Quantities are limited, while supplies last.
 • KICKS CREW reserves the right to change the terms and conditions, suspend or terminate the activity at any time without prior notice.

app.label: Download the CREW APP for the best shopping experience!
